item.name: Panel Service
item.description:
**NOTE** that dev APIs require conse hyper server **JWT** to be passed to request Authorization header.

**NOTE** that you can get the **JWT** from the response cookie of the admin and user `login` API which is the first part of `::` sign.

**NOTE** that to define twitter tasks we must prefix the `task_name` field inside the register new task API with `twitter-\\*` which `\\*` can be one of the following task names:

- username
- code
- tweet
- retweet
- hashtag
- like
